overview: Emy joins a group of charming young ladies applying at a school. The school's headmistress initially welcomes Emy. Then she rejects her, but agrees after letting her undergo a medical examination.  The movie, shot in Italian with a primarily Italian cast and an Italian director in 1981, with the title "Quella porcacciona di mia moglie," was caught in a censorship scandal and was repackaged with French inserts (and several different titles) and redubbed for the French market. It was later released in Italy in 1983.
title: Teenage Emanuelle
